title: About me
description1: My name is Miguel √Ångel, and I discovered programming by chance at university. Since then, I've been passionate about solving problems and creating solutions through code. Currently, I work as Frontend Software Engineer at Genially, where I am dedicated to innovate and improve the user experience.
description2: Some of my achievements include collaborating in several open source projects, among them the 'covid-vacuna' website powered by Midudev.
